q: How can you undo one or more changes just made to an image?
a: Click a state in the history panel

q: How can you open a file selected in Lightroom CC for retouching in Photoshop CC?
How can you select a specific layer?
a: Use the Move tool with auto-select enabled
Click the eye icon in the layers panel
Right-click the image and select layer
Press Cmd/Ctrl and click the layer
